request.description: Alfresco Identity Service is implemented on top ofÂ [JBoss Keycloak](https://www.keycloak.org/), which is both an Identity Provider (IdP) and a token issuer for OAuth 2 tokens. Keycloak deals with authentication, safety password storage, SSO, two factor authentication etc. Keycloak supports protocols such as OpenID Connect and SAML. Keycloak can store the user data in a variety of places, such as LDAP, Active Directory, and RDBMS.
